General.Name: Société de Services de Participations de Direction et d'Elaboration
General.Description: Spadel SA produces and markets natural mineral water in Belgium. It offers natural mineral water under the Spa, Bru, Wattwiller, Carola, and Devin brand names. The company is based in Woluwe-Saint-Lambert, Belgium. Spadel SA operates as a subsidiary of Finances Et Industries SA.
General.Address: Avenue des Communities N ° 110, Woluwe-Saint-Lambert, Belgium, 1200
